name: Chana Masala
instructions: Boil chick peas in salted water until soft, then drain and set to the side
Thinly cover pan in olive oil, heat at medium high
Shake cumin seeds over the pan of olive oil, wait for the cumin seeds to change color (but don't burn them)
Add the rest of the ingredients to the pan, plus a small cup of water
Cover lid of pan and let cook for 3 minutes, stir, and the cook for 3 more minutes
Add chick peas to the pan. Cook for an additional 4-5 minutes
At this point you are done. Serve with warm naan bread or rice, or both (preferred that the rice is long grain Basmati rice)
